Desc.entry: Works with individuals, couples and families. Experienced in working with eating disorders, anxiety and depression, self-harm and/or suicidal ideation, self-esteem issues, sexual abuse, relationship difficulties, behavioural issues with children and attachment difficulties. Costs approx £40 per session for individuals and £45 for couple or family sessions. Also offers clinical supervision which costs approx £45 per hour. Qualifications: Qualified Gestalt psychotherapist and systemic practitioner, qualified social worker, registered with United Kingdom Council of Psychotherapy. Studying for PG Diploma in Supervision. Has regular professional, clinical supervision.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mondays (other therapists available at Cornerstone on other days)
